member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_HD44780
member.summary: A simple character display module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

example.para: The following example uses a object to display "Hello World" on the character display. First, we clear the screen and set the cursor to the top left corner. Then, we display our desired text to the screen.
